bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS, APPARATUS, AND SYSTEMS FOR SUPPORTING PURCHASES OF GOODS AND SERVICES VIA PREPAID TELECOMMUNICATION ACCOUNTS

nplcit.text: University System of New Hampshire Financial and Administrative Procedures, Procedure 4-32 Uncollectible Accounts Receivable Write Off Bad Debts, 05/31/94 (Uncollectible)

abstract.p: Apparatus and method for detecting in real-time when a User of a prepaid telecommunications account tries to complete a data, voice or financial transaction to purchase a product or service but cannot, due to insufficient funds in the Prepaid Account. The system then determines whether the Account is eligible to receive a Facilitation according to predetermined criteria and, if so, either (1) automatically authorizes the transaction to be completed based on a Facilitation amount, subsequently recorded by the system to satisfy the insufficiency, or (2) instantly communicates to the User an offer to do so, and if the User accepts the offer, authorizes the transaction and records the Facilitation amount. The transaction can then be completed without significant interruption. A mechanism is provided such that on the next Topping-Up event(s) of the User's Account, the Facilitation amount is debited from the User's Account for return to the Facilitator.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METODOS, EQUIPOS Y SISTEMAS PARA RESPALDAR LA COMPRA DE BIENES Y SERVICIOS A TRAVES DE CUENTAS PREPAGADAS DE TELECOMUNICACIONES

abstract.p: Dispositivo y método para detectar en tiempo real cuándo un usuario de una cuenta prepagada de telecomunicaciones trata de realizar una transaccion de datos, de voz o financiera para comprar un producto o servicio, pero no puede hacerlo debido a que el saldo de su cuenta es insuficiente. El sistema entonces determina si la cuenta reune los requisitos para que se le otorgue una facilitacion que se efectua segun criterios predeterminados y, en dicho caso: (1) autoriza automáticamente la transaccion en base a un monto de facilitacion, que posteriormente el sistema registra, para compensar la insuficiencia

o (2) instantáneamente envía al usuario una oferta para hacerlo y, si este acepta, autoriza la transaccion y registra el monto de facilitacion. De ese modo, la transaccion se puede realizar sin interrupciones significativas.
Se dispone de un dispositivo por el cual la siguiente vez que el usuario recarga la cuenta, se le debita de esta el monto de facilitacion el cual se envía al facilitador.

The system then determines whether the Account is eligible to receive a Facilitation according to predetermined criteria and, if so, either (1) automatically authorizes the transaction to be completed based on a Facilitation amount, subsequently recorded by the system to satisfy the insufficiency, or (2) instantly communicates to the User an offer to do so, and if the User accepts the offer, authorizes the transaction and records the Facilitation amount. The transaction can then be completed without significant interruption.

A mechanism is provided such that on the next Topping-Up event(s) of the User's Account, the Facilitation amount is debited from the User's Account for return to the Facilitator. abstract.p: Apparatus and method for detecting in real-time when a User of a prepaid telecommunications account tries to complete a data, voice or financial transaction to purchase a product or service but cannot, due to insufficient funds in the Prepaid Account. The system then determines whether the Account is eligible to receive a Facilitation according to predetermined criteria and, if so, either (1) automatically authorizes the transaction to be completed based on a Facilitation amount, subsequently recorded by the system to satisfy the insufficiency, or (2) instantly communicates to the User an offer to do so, and if the User accepts the offer, authorizes the transaction and records the Facilitation amount. The transaction can then be completed without significant interruption. A mechanism is provided such that on the next Topping-Up event(s) of the User's Account, the Facilitation amount is debited from the User's Account for return to the Facilitator.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS, APPARATUS, AND SYSTEMS FOR SUPPORTING PURCHASES OF GOODS AND SERVICES VIA PREPAID TELECOMMUNICATION ACCOUNTS
PROCÉDÉS, APPAREIL, ET SYSTÈMES D'ASSISTANCE À DES ACHATS DE BIENS ET DE SERVICES PAR L'INTERMÉDIAIRE DE COMPTES DE TÉLÉCOMMUNICATION À PRÉPAIEMENT

abstract.p: Apparatus and method for detecting in real-time when a User of a prepaid telecommunications account tries to complete a data, voice or financial transaction to purchase a product or service but cannot, due to insufficient funds in the Prepaid Account. The system then determines whether the Account is eligible to receive a Facilitation according to predetermined criteria and, if so, either (1) automatically authorizes the transaction to be completed based on a Facilitation amount, subsequently recorded by the system to satisfy the insufficiency, or (2) instantly communicates to the User an offer to do so, and if the User accepts the offer, authorizes the transaction and records the Facilitation amount. The transaction can then be completed without significant interruption. A mechanism is provided such that on the next Topping-Up event(s) of the User's Account, the Facilitation amount is debited from the User's Account for return to the Facilitator.

L'invention porte sur un appareil et sur un procédé destiné à détecter en temps réel lorsqu'un utilisateur d'un compte de télécommunications à prépaiement essaie d'exécuter une transaction informatique, vocale ou financière pour l'achat d'un produit ou d'un service, mais ne le peut pas en raison d'un crédit insuffisant sur le compte à prépaiement. Le système détermine ensuite si le compte est habilité à recevoir une facilité selon des critères prédéterminés et, si oui, soit (1) autorise automatiquement la transaction à s'accomplir sur la base d'un montant de facilité, enregistré par la suite par le système pour remédier à l'insuffisance, soit (2) communique instantanément à l'utilisateur une offre à lui proposer, et si l'utilisateur accepte l'offre, autorise la transaction et enregistre le montant de la facilité.

La transaction peut être ensuite exécutée sans interruption significative. Il est prévu un mécanisme tel que lors du (des) prochain(s) événement(s) de complément du compte de l'utilisateur, le montant de la facilité est débité du compte de l'utilisateur pour être remboursé au facilitateur.
